title: Rupee slips to record low as amid uncertainty over global economy, India-US trade deal
description:
The Indian rupee plunged to a fresh lifetime low on Friday amid heavy foreign outflows, uncertainty over the proposed United States–India trade deal and what traders said was a softer defence by the RBI. The steep fall left the currency as Asia’s weakest performer so far this year.

The Indian rupee...

title: Former U.S. Trade Rep. Katherine Tai Says Biden Policies Marked Historic Break With Neoliberalism
description:
Former United States Trade Representative Katherine C. Tai said at a Harvard talk on Wednesday that the Biden administration set in motion a reversal of decades of neoliberal economic policy that has persisted under President Donald Trump’s second term.

Tai, who served for four years under Presiden...

title: Unemployment edges up to 4.4% in September while 119,000 jobs are added
description:
Unemployment edges up to 4.4% in September while 119,000 jobs are added

Around 7.6 million people were unemployed in September 2025, raising the unemployment rate to a four-year high of 4.4%. This is based on the monthly employment situation report by the Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS).Related Vi...

title: The Latest: September job numbers double expectations, while unemployment ticks up
description:
U.S. employers added a surprisingly solid 119,000 jobs in September, the government said, issuing a key economic report that had been delayed for seven weeks by the federal government shutdown. The increase in payrolls was more than double the 50,000 economists had forecast.
